sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'select * from moviestage where movie = 989898',
	format: 'query') ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['movie']) ~> sink1
